Content: Sri Lanka Freedom Party's Jayantha Marasinghe was elected as the Chairman of Dimbulagala Pradeshiya Sabha, which was won by the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna. United National Party's Sisira Deshapriya was chosen as the Deputy Chairman. During the vote to elect the Chairman, Marasinghe was able to secure more votes than SLPP's Anuradha Ratnayake. Meanwhile, Attorney-at-Law, Madura Vithanage was chosen as the Mayor of Sri Jayewardenepura Municipal Council.
